There are several museums in the centre of Cambridge. One option is the Broughton House Gallery located at 98 King Street, postcode CB11LN. You can contact them at 01223314960. Another option is the Cambridge Contemporary Art at 6 Trinity Street, postcode CB21SU, phone number 01223324222. There's also the Castle Galleries at Unit SU43, Grande Arcade, Saint Andrews Street, postcode CB23BJ, phone number 01223307402. The Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology is another great choice, located at the University of Cambridge, Downing Street, postcode CB23DZ, phone number 01223333516. Lastly, there's Primavera at 10 King's Parade, postcode CB21SJ, phone number 01223357708. All of these museums have free entrance.

There are several museums in the east of Cambridge. One option is the Cambridge Artworks located at 5 Greens Road, postcode CB13EF. You can contact them at 01223902168. Another option is the Cambridge Museum of Technology at The Old Pumping Station, Cheddars Lane, postcode CB58LD, phone number 01223368650. There's also the Gallery at Twelve A High Street in Fulbourn, phone number 01223295264, postcode CB15DH. Lastly, the Saint Barnabas Press Gallery at The Belfast Yard, Coldham's Road, phone number 01223902116, postcode CB13EW. All of these museums are free except for the Cambridge Museum of Technology which has an entrance fee of 5 pounds.
